title: Language Learning Strategy Development Utilizing Web 2.0 Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen language learning competencies using Web 2.0 tools in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, emphasizing relevance to current practitioners' work.

learning_goals: Learners can compare web 2.0 utilization patterns between Malaysian and global learners based on survey results.
Learners can design content creation plans using at least three web 2.0 tools (e.g., podcasts, blogs, social bookmarks) for language learning.
Learners can develop and present specific language learning scenarios applying web 2.0 tools through project-based assessments.

resources: Offline Collaboration Tools (e.g., Post-it Notes, Flipcharts)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
